text: Brad Lewis Kavanagh (born 21 August 1992) is an English actor and singer- songwriter. He started acting when he was 11 years old on a western stage, playing Michael in Billy Elliot: the Musical. He then worked with Disney UK for a while before getting hired to play Fabian Rutter on House of Anubis. == References == Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:English television actors Category:English singers
title: Brad Kavanagh
